ygData.subject: RE: Psalm Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I know we get the non-melee message with Psalm of Warmth.  It s the exactly  the same as the thorn damage shield (as far as the message goes) - white text.
ygData.messageBody:
I know we get the "non-melee" message with Psalm of Warmth. It's the
exactly the same as the thorn damage shield (as far as the message goes) -
white text.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 3:35 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Psalm Questions
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> I know for certain that the messages for both songs appeared,
> i.e. "you feel
> protected from cold". Can't confirm if the mob was actually
> taking damage
> from both of them though. Its hard to track all the messages
> that scroll
> through in a combat so when I got the confirmation that the
> song went into
> affect, just assumed that the mob was getting burned/frozen.
> Sure wish we
> got the white text message for our damage shields similar to
> what you get
> when you have the druid thorn buff (not certain of exact
> name). With the
> thorn buff, it tells you how much non-melee damage the mob
> took when they
> hit you. Anyone have an idea why we don't get a similar message?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: kim@... [SMTP:kim@...]
> > Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 11:25 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Psalm Questions
> >
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
> > >
> > > To recap, here is what I know about our resist buffs songs.
> > >
> > > 1) Elemental and Purifying rhythms do not stack together
> > > 2) Guardian Rhythms will stack with Elemental or Purifying.
> > >
> > > Need to confirm:
> > > 1) Do the rhythm series songs stack with the Psalm series?
> >
> > Guardian Rhythms stack with Psalm of Warmth, Cooling, and
> > Vitality. I haven't tested it with Purity or Mystic
> > Shielding. The Psalm series does not stack with any other
> > Rhythm song.
> >
> > I was unable to get Psalm of Warmth and Cooling to
> > stack. When your friend and you did it, did you get both
> > damage shields (10 points/hit at your level)? Or did they
> > cancel each other out since one burns the opponent while the
> > other chills it?
> >
> > --
> >
>
